items.summary: Update backend registration so that every newly registered account is automatically assigned the default "user" role without requiring the caller to be an admin, ensuring sign-up no longer fails with "Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles".

Ensure the backend "register" method never traps due to role assignment during sign-up; if role assignment fails for any reason, the method must return RegistrationResult.#error with an appropriate RegistrationError instead of trapping.
